description: List project transport plan driver assignments

flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID
flags.name: --project-transport-plan

flags.description: Filter by project transport plan status
flags.name: --project-transport-plan-status

flags.description: Filter by driver (user) ID
flags.name: --driver

flags.description: Filter by presence of driver (true/false)
flags.name: --has-driver

flags.description: Filter by segment start ID
flags.name: --segment-start

flags.description: Filter by segment end ID
flags.name: --segment-end

flags.description: Filter by assignment status (editing/pending/active)
flags.name: --status

flags.description: Filter by window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-start-at-cached

flags.description: Filter by minimum window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-min

flags.description: Filter by maximum window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-max

flags.description: Filter by presence of window start date (true/false)
flags.name: --has-window-start-at-cached

flags.description: Filter by window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-end-at-cached

flags.description: Filter by minimum window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-min

flags.description: Filter by maximum window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-max

flags.description: Filter by presence of window end date (true/false)
flags.name: --has-window-end-at-cached

flags.description: Filter by trucker ID (segment range)
flags.name: --trucker

flags.description: Filter by inbound project office ID
flags.name: --inbound-project-office

flags.description: Filter to most recent assignment per driver (true/false)
flags.name: --most-recent

flags.description: Filter by managed transport orders or none (true/false)
flags.name: --has-managed-transport-order-or-no-transport-order

flags.description: Filter by broker ID
flags.name: --broker

permissions: Access is delegated to the related project transport plan; users can list records within the ProjectTransportPlanPolicy scope (project access or active driver assignment to a plan).
validation_notes: status must be one of editing, pending, active. Date filters use YYYY-MM-DD. Boolean filters accept true/false.
